attributes.action: Legislate that the BBC report news without bias and without political comment
attributes.background: I am fed up with watching the BBC report the news with bias against Brexit and against MPs who supported Brexit.  This also includes bias on QT panels and audience make up.

rejection.details:
The Broadcasting Act 1990 already requires this. You might like to sign this petition instead, which is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129470
